parameters.content:
## Backup to GitHub 
This workflow will backup all instance workflows to GitHub every 24 hours.

The files are saved into folders using `YYYY/MM/` for the directory path and `ID.json` for the filename.

The Repo Owner, Repo Name and Main folder are set using the **Variables** feature but can be replaced with the `Config` node in the subworkflow. 

The workflow runs calls itself to help reduce memory usage, Once the workflow has completed it will send an optional notification to Slack.

### Time to Run
Tested with 1423 workflows on `1.44.1` it took under 30 minutes for the first run and under 12 minutes once the initial run is complete.

import time
import base64
import json
from cryptography.hazmat.primitives.serialization import load_pem_private_key
from cryptography.hazmat.primitives.asymmetric import padding
from cryptography.hazmat.primitives import hashes

# Helper to base64-url encode (no padding)
def b64url(data):
    return base64.urlsafe_b64encode(data).rstrip(b'=')

# Inputs: adjust for n8n variables if needed
username = "nkwok"    # e.g., 'MYUSER'
account = "qqa43113.us-west-2.privatelink"      # e.g., 'myorg-myaccount'
private_key_str = """-----BEGIN PRIVATE KEY-----
MIIEvgIBADANBgkqhkiG9w0BAQEFAASCBKgwggSkAgEAAoIBAQDP/mW46Z4Pw8/i
kWWzlqdnzXnRtxJsa0Xt3fpM+votaRFOWZXMowYZfsT8GqD/zVqzoHr8Sig0lGAx
xq+/ALCas1PDr68K3/rs7KCIcdeA3v9RW7+FRhqHpofQw+4UXnGqAq/4YhjshrZM
Gqnxt44Q4UF2HhNVFKIMx/CbowP2vq9mKyEQWfv48c4xEdQC2/07OkLjFtLjCQrX
69RmX7lWPVM8IcFwVxFwvMybf2v3uYsqoWsn/S5Lazi+iY8wT1NA5vbwDIV7fN6c
GKp5N90lAYCWwZ4ah1Fk/mdOoMjoLTeuK+S12Pj92E4cicbbXvL3s8qHBGW37+1S
qnWwo51NAgMBAAECggEAFVJDSY2CkKQmhdfDdgGeFJPUMTgpRn2dVAZ6zPRiEVCh
dQeARdN6YcJZ3WwPZVmUOttbGsyxSr6LuTPgZTM5Z1+1rlbZRJie8jWe4+MjpR12
98ybbpqNSAA9ZkcHe1q5H8/vC7ERVAHKjd+ihy76pxFS8rxKMrZkQZd8uz+ekucG
vgZuzfqEWS3zyxYf54qXnWUG3tVv/5PP0CHcnXhAsJQBvFEq2jgxcl4B2agEeqwr
fNR10k7U9un7J6NsSTREN0TDlsrbuu057mCQhfyzw80VO2nCTG8AoIJyJ5Pb1d4n
YxnM3fkriIGF9gDXEbKZ7QbJc0Z1YxZX4VEA1PxKgwKBgQD64+Fj2Wkf1gKfGMTF
JsgMBksVs2eG4qTw6SKRDUUgGHtA2+427BHgHmf2qwzZcWXqd7vag3ts7vcFpGAy
waqrOHzuL4RomPDO/r76pwxCdGZ7bPZ/G19jL0kHtPF/fwS8N7HBdxllIoxetXIb
fWr6DqMcP9QVNW3uU3BtXJ89IwKBgQDUOtvUdMFHZxZlTHiC8tIb2PRfyh16t+19
Llb37+SXKiHvAFzuF0yULZLrqNojaGU2tt/ZiOmbsnKb+H+l1n3jDqHtiUFPy8FY
LTFjNSdgrIV2vLxG9/FKg442sWrsFnnFW+XLLc15IatSOOjfd/qhNjbwkRq78mcO
f/iUmG/6zwKBgQDPH0H7hIjc13jijzgi6plMFAX4rFtTZ9hzaoQ265WdoZhfOzG1
9b3sIC4D3cKF4LAamS5kfxduHvmflsw0Gt4i7Ed2+5N8Jobm3DgeBbqBQkc4rgPx
e0+MOoU375FPiDUIjZIZ/ZDhhVwM9A5301p1hY/yyl70A1/12LyADG8JsQKBgQCP
+qJafx8EvuYNsRRs2ik6pTQcrDTVpWQjscVkjUYKW5YL27Yv/HSCbmynHbVnohJQ
TT6OCPlbHHPuZmbK7joXST0Htj8t0HCJzpcb09q0FjaxOBePGfSDdb6MUk7Ufeb8
wnyiG5+zFulwbZVmzbGlnu8kw3xcl3Xc+2p7/PKzNwKBgAXi7ChohuXfMSTgUZed
8D7jAxCGojSs+GB/ZIpJRKwbdUrxWSIQVfNVbLf/m6sEyCKJHJygFuwBm0JCEEUL
dlO4LY7UpfcgZ5WtCLBXrRyMe8jaFfMdyBmwBHGSe8bdKNWhBQdRAByiBw0lQPsK
5E4WiWPucZN9WeoMiA1A9yFL
-----END PRIVATE KEY-----"""  # PEM string

# JWT header and payload
header = {"alg": "RS256", "typ": "JWT"}
now = int(time.time())
payload = {
    "iss": f"{account.upper()}.{username.upper()}.SHA256",
    "sub": f"{account.upper()}.{username.upper()}",
    "iat": now,
    "exp": now + 60
}

# Encode header & payload
header_b64 = b64url(json.dumps(header, separators=(',', ':')).encode())
payload_b64 = b64url(json.dumps(payload, separators=(',', ':')).encode())
message = header_b64 + b'.' + payload_b64

# Load private key
private_key = load_pem_private_key(
    private_key_str.encode(),
    password=None,
)

# Sign with RS256
signature = private_key.sign(
    message,
    padding.PKCS1v15(),
    hashes.SHA256()
)
signature_b64 = b64url(signature)

# Assemble JWT
jwt_token = message + b'.' + signature_b64

# Output as string
return {
    "jwt_token": jwt_token.decode()
}

import requests
